attributes.action: Why should we have to pay back money that is given to us for tax credits if it is there mistake e
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of people are being payed the wrong amount of tax credits each year by the inland revenue. Then they recieve a letter saying that they have been paid  too much and you have to pay it back. Some people cant afford to live let alone pay back money that was paid to you and was someone elses mistake. Something needs to be done.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
